messages.title: Save Whittington Hospital A&E
messages.content: Oppose any closure or reduction in A&E services at the Whittington Hospital and any overall reduction in services provided there.

messages.title: We called to see you today
messages.content: Three good reasons to support your Lib Dem Team: 1. Lib Dems - for a fairer Camden Freezing Council Tax, getting housing repairs done and fighting for our hospitals. 2. Labour have let you down Brown hikes taxes every year, blocked Â£283million to do up our homes and failed to safeguard our hospitals. 3. It's Lib Dems or Labour here The Conservatives came a poor 3rd place last time. Only the Lib Dems can win against Labour here.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Freezing Council Tax, ensuring housing repairs are completed.
Fighting for hospital services and opposing the closure or reduction of A&E services at Whittington Hospital.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's Lib Dems or Labour here. The Conservatives came a poor 3rd place last time. Only the Lib Dems can win against Labour here.

housing.content: Freezing Council Tax, getting housing repairs done.
